metadata.title: CVE-2023-52722 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Artifex Ghostscript through 10.01.0.psi/zmisc1.c, when SAFER mode is used, allows eexec seeds other than theType 1 standard.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7
libgs-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7
libgs10 - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7
libgs10-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7').
